00018 #include <iostream>
00019 #include <boost/program_options.hpp>
00020 #include <votca/tools/property.h>
00021 #include <list>
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 using namespace votca::tools;

00026 void help_text()
00027 {
00028     cout << "Helper program to parse xml file.\n\n";
00029 }
00030 
00031 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00032 {      
00033     string file;
00034     bool short_output = false;
00035     bool with_path = false;
00036 
00037     // lets read in some program options
00038     namespace po = boost::program_options;
00039 
00040     // Declare the supported options.
00041     po::options_description desc("Allowed options");    
00042     desc.add_options()
00043         ("help", "produce this help message")
00044         ("file", po::value<string>(&file), "xml file to parse");
00045 
00046     // now read in the command line
00047     po::variables_map vm;
00048     try {
00049         po::store(po::parse_command_line(argc, argv, desc), vm);    
00050         po::notify(vm);
00051     }
00052     catch(po::error err) {
00053         cout << "error parsing command line: " << err.what() << endl;
00054         return -1;
00055     }
00056     // does the user want help?
00057     if (vm.count("help")) {
00058         help_text();
00059         cout << desc << endl;
00060         return 0;
00061     }
00062     // file specified
00063     if (!vm.count("file")) {
00064         cout << "please specify file\n";                
00065         cout << desc << endl;
00066         return -1;
00067     }
00068 
00069     try {
00070 
00071     Property p;
00072     load_property_from_xml(p, file);
00073     
00074     cout << "loaded  "  << file << endl;
00075 
00076     list<Property *> sel = p.Select("*");
00077 
00078     Tokenizer tok("cg_molecule",".");
00079     Property pn;
00080     for( Tokenizer::iterator n = tok.begin(); n!=tok.end(); ++n) {
00081          pn = pn.get(*n);
00082     }
00083 
00084 
00085     cout << "info: " << p.name() <<":"<< p.path() <<":"<< p.value() << ":" << p.size() << endl;
00086 
00087         for(list<Property*>::iterator iter = sel.begin(); iter!=sel.end(); ++iter) {
00088         }
00089     } catch(std::exception &error) {
00090         cerr << "an error occurred:\n" << error.what() << endl;
00091         return -1;
00092     }
00093     return 0;
00094 }
